Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: My husband and I came here with our teen daughter to do the unthinkable on a Friday night-buy beer and snacks for a night at home. Debbie, a complete crap for brains decked in stereotypical biker/trailer attire, refused to sell to us because her own  personal reasons . I'm black, my husband is white, and my daughter (whom I adopted) is white. She didn't think to stop the family before us who, too purchased alcohol with younger children. My husband asked her  so you're telling me you're refusing to sell to me? That's illegal . Debbie stuttered and said  no it's not the law, but it's my own reason. You can call corporate, they know me very well . Angry, we left and I called the store and spoke to Ken. When I explained the situation to him, he was very perplexed as to why Debbie would react and behave in such a way. I demanded to see him, so we returned to the store. When my husband explained yet again what occurred, Ken told us that the reason Debbie refused to sell alcohol to us is because she overheard our daughter telling us what flavor of beer she wanted. First off, this is a flat out lie! My husband asked me what kind of beer I wanted, and I responded. How unreal to make up a lie to save your own ass? She has no idea about our backgrounds, or what we do professionally in our lives. Regardless, we took our business to Smith's where the customer service has been nothing short of amazing. Debbie, EEO will be contacted.

Reviews.Author: Eddie
Reviews.Content: People are very rude they don't know where any of their stuff in the store is and the cashier's check too long to check people out

Reviews.Author: Perla
Reviews.Content: Absolutely hate this place everyone I've  dealt with in the store is extremely rude I've  gone three times before i wrote this review and all three I've had a bad experience i will drive further down the road to Smiths to get a smile and better customer service!

Reviews.Author: Lonnie
Reviews.Content: Never think to yourself that your gonna run to the store really quick! Especially if that store is Walmart. Mostly all checkers there have no sense of urgency and the people that shop there, wow!  So broke!  So broke that they're to blame for the lines because they're unable to pay for their crap. Why is it that I have to wait twenty minuets (not an exaggeration) to pay for my groceries with one person ahead of ME! While their other employees  act  like they got better things to do. There was a reason I stopped shopping at Walmart. For sure, I will never step foot in this place again!

Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: Low quality product, clientele and employees. Can't even keep the shopping carts picked up in the parking lot. Ghetto place is bringing down the neighborhood. I'll Go to the Smiths up the street two blocks.

Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I go here because it's nearby with a lot necessities with low prices. The staff for the most part doesn't really care, so that is always a downer. Lately its hard to find the things we need. So if we can, we go down the street to Smiths where we usually find what we need with better service.

Reviews.Author: Jaycee
Reviews.Content: I purchased a two liter coke for $2.5 in this warmart!!! I went back and talked with the cashier and she said she didn't know why,she did not want to admit her mistake and try to palter with this.not even a word for sorry!!! don't like the experience here!!!!

Reviews.Author: Nichole
Reviews.Content: Not a fan of this location. They are usually out of everything that you might be looking for and they dont keep the store clean. Most of the produce is very sad looking and typically one cashier open (so plan on it taking about 20 min to check out). 2 stars for convenience (only other store within a few miles is smiths on centennial).

Reviews.Author: Adlai
Reviews.Content: Manager is extremely rude and very uncaring. I called with a general question and she flat out said no without letting me finished then hung up the phone on me. As far as being inside the store, the store is fine itself but the lines are horrendously long.

Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: A pretty good little neighborhood market. They have most of what I'm looking for in a pinch and the prices are reasonable. Lines can be a bit long on busy evenings but that's just the way of the world. The managers and all the team are always trying their best. This is not where the Queen of England shops so don't be expecting anything over-the-top fancy.
